name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Shopping in Cebu
description: You're already here in the Philippines, then why don't you do cheap shopping! Yes, I tell you. I will take you all the secret and not-so-secret hideouts of the place to shop here in Cebu. You'll have fun shopping without hurting your pocket. We'll also have a side-trip of eating mouth-watering street foods and transport the Filipino way! Yayy, jeepneys!
